data.title: Sorry... It's just a precaution, Goathard...
data.meta_description: ...I need to know where you are and what you do when I connect the electrical !! It's time to connect the large solar panel to the house's electrical system, and Gustaf has learned from experience... to never do certain jobs with a crazy and curious goat in total freedom and without supervision...; )) Special to remember: www.flickr.com/photos/goathard/51536787050/in/dateposted-... and www.flickr.com/photos/goathard/50824957722/in/dateposted-... and a lot of other situations! (♫) Tage Danielsson - Elektricitetsvisan (The Electricity Song) www.youtube.com/watch?v=csRqxVXR-N0 Translation: It's too damn, what we got it good in both Humpen and Vreten We've got threads like in a city which makes the electricity You just snap, have no trouble then there will be volts in the thread And out of volts it becomes ampere it's so hard to understand it For: Everything goes with electricity Electrically it is something strange with that Electric it flows, after all as you know here and there through the thread Some talking But now that the power has gone out in both Vreten and Humpen So it stands still in the milking machine, in the freezer and in the pump In the dark the tractor you give molasses and pours oil on the heifer It is just as difficult to walk on the outdoor toilet like noticing the difference between my wife and the maid For: Everything goes with electricity Electrically, it's something strange with that Electric it flows, after all as you know here and there through the thread Some talking Now the engagement is over between Gerhard and Lotten For her hair looks too awful there is no electricity in the curler And now that the TV has said good night and no watts are present in the screen We have been on the pull-out sofa there we make a volt and keep the heat For: Everything goes with electricity Electrically it is something strange with that Electric it flows, after all as you know here and there through the thread Some talking Thöö Hummm-peeenn boys They're playing pop and made electric tones When the power went out then they gave up Then they had to go and take lessons And August has received yellow teeth Who wants to seem so far-fetched Because now the plug has gone In the electric toothbrush from America For: Everything goes with electricity Electrically it is something strange with that Electric it flows, after all as you know Here and there through the thread Some talking You can no longer be unshaven With a plug in an electrical wall My device runs on battery But everyone else has a full beard I shaved my grandfather last night When I finished the mustache Out of the darkness, Grandma happily exclaims: "Well, thank you so much for the massage" For: Everything goes with electricity Electrically it is something strange with that Electric it flows, after all as you know here and there through the thread Moment at our home... ...in Second Life, which is an online virtual world by the firm Linden Lab, since June 2003.
data.text:
...I need to know where you are and what you do when I connect the electrical !!

It's time to connect the large solar panel to the house's electrical system, and Gustaf has learned from experience... to never do certain jobs with a crazy and curious goat in total freedom and without supervision...; ))

Special to remember:

www.flickr.com/photos/goathard/51536787050/in/dateposted-...

and

www.flickr.com/photos/goathard/50824957722/in/dateposted-...

and a lot of other situations!

(♫)

Tage Danielsson - Elektricitetsvisan (The Electricity Song)

www.youtube.com/watch?v=csRqxVXR-N0

Translation:

It's too damn, what we got it good

in both Humpen and Vreten

We've got threads like in a city

which makes the electricity

You just snap, have no trouble

then there will be volts in the thread

And out of volts it becomes ampere

it's so hard to understand it

For: Everything goes with electricity

Electrically it is something

strange with that

Electric it flows, after all

as you know

here and there through the thread

Some talking

But now that the power has gone out

in both Vreten and Humpen

So it stands still in the milking machine,

in the freezer and in the pump

In the dark the tractor you give molasses

and pours oil on the heifer

It is just as difficult to walk on the outdoor toilet

like noticing the difference between my wife and the maid

For: Everything goes with electricity

Electrically, it's something

strange with that

Electric it flows, after all

as you know

here and there through the thread

Some talking

Now the engagement is over

between Gerhard and Lotten

For her hair looks too awful

there is no electricity in the curler

And now that the TV has said good night

and no watts are present in the screen

We have been on the pull-out sofa there

we make a volt and keep the heat

For: Everything goes with electricity

Electrically it is something

strange with that

Electric it flows, after all

as you know

here and there through the thread

Some talking

Thöö Hummm-peeenn boys

They're playing pop

and made electric tones

When the power went out

then they gave up

Then they had to go and take lessons

And August has received yellow teeth

Who wants to seem so far-fetched

Because now the plug has gone

In the electric toothbrush from America

For: Everything goes with electricity

Electrically it is something

strange with that

Electric it flows, after all

as you know

Here and there through the thread

Some talking

You can no longer be unshaven

With a plug in an electrical wall

My device runs on battery

But everyone else has a full beard

I shaved my grandfather last night

When I finished the mustache

Out of the darkness, Grandma happily exclaims:

"Well, thank you so much for the massage"

For: Everything goes with electricity

Electrically it is something

strange with that

Electric it flows, after all

as you know

here and there through the thread

Moment at our home...

...in Second Life, which is an online virtual world by the firm Linden Lab, since June 2003.
